import React, { useEffect } from "react" import {useSelector} from "react-redux" import {useBanner} from "../store/action/index" export default function BannerPage(props){ //获取状态管理仓库中的banner状态管理函数数据 let state = useSelector((state)=>{ return state }) let {bannerReducer} = state; let getData = useBanner() useEffect(()=>{ getData() },[]) let {data} = bannerReducer //结构出需要的数据:id,图片地址，分类标签 let {banners} = data return (

PC 安卓 iPhone WP iPad Mac 六大客户端

) }
